txt.en: Thane Nothmar has asked you to place barricades on the path leading up the cliff to Gapholt.\n\nWith the wood you gathered, you should build the barricades on the south-west and eastern sides of town.
Filled Thane Nothmar's waterskin in the waterfall

'Thank you, [placeholder]. Your aid has eased my worries for Gapholt's safety. If the Enemy comes in great number, no amount of preparation would have helped. But with your aid, the men can hold off a reasonable attack, should the Enemy come while we are gone.'

'I cannot in good conscience leave Gapholt in this state. We are barely prepared for an attack with the men we have, and if I take men with me to Woodhurst, then Gapholt will be helpless against any enemy force. If you want my aid, you must first help us prepare.\n\n'We could use barricades constructed throughout the town so any attackers would be funneled towards a more defensible location.'
Thane Nothmar has agreed to aid Woodhurst, but first Gapholt needs to be better prepared to be defended by fewer men.
Filled Thane Nothmar's waterskin in the waterfall
This is a good place to fill Nothmar's waterskin
Thane Nothmar is near the bridge leading into Gapholt.\n\nYou should return to Thane Nothmar to see if he needs anything else done before departing for Woodhurst.

'The barricades you made seem sturdy and will help the remaining defenders should the enemy attack. Your help building and placing them is appreciated.\n\n'We are nearly ready to depart for Woodhurst, but we could use a few supplies for the journey. We could use a supply of berries that grow in the woods nearby.'
Thane Nothmar asked for berries that grow in the woods outside of town.\n\nThane Nothmar asked for help gathering supplies for the men that will journey with him to aid Woodhurst.
This is a good spot to fill the water puch
This is a good place to build a barricade
Fill Thane Nothmar's waterskin in the waterfall
'Thank you for collecting these berries. They should tide the men over until we reach Woodhurst.\n\n'Could you fill my waterskin in the waterfall?'
Thane Nothmar is near the bridge leading into Gapholt.\n\nYou should return to Thane Nothmar with the supplies you helped gather for the journey to Woodhurst.

Thane Nothmar has asked you to place barricades on the path leading up the cliff to Gapholt.\n\nWith the wood you gathered, you should build the barricades on the south-west and eastern sides of town.

Thane Nothmar has asked you to place barricades on the path leading up the cliff to Gapholt.\n\nWith the wood you gathered, you should build the barricades on the south-west and eastern sides of town.
Thane Nothmar is near the bridge leading into Gapholt.\n\nReturn to Nothmar in Gapholt with the berries you collected.
'Thank you for collecting these berries. They should tide the men over until we reach Woodhurst.\n\n'Could you fill my waterskin in the waterfall?'
Take Nothmar's waterskin and fill it within the water fall near Gapholt.
Fill Thane Nothmar's waterskin in the waterfall
Thane Nothmar has asked you to place barricades around Gapholt.\n\nYou will need to gather wood from around Gapholt with which to build the barricades.
This is a good place to fill Nothmar's waterskin
Thane Nothmar has asked you to place barricades near the bridge leading in to Gapholt.\n\nWith the wood you gathered, you should build the barricades on the south-west and eastern sides of town.
Thane Nothmar has asked you to place barricades near the bridge leading in to Gapholt.\n\nWith the wood you gathered, you should build the barricades on the south-west and eastern sides of town.
Fill the water pouch in the waterfall
